title: Unchained alistar

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Cant get unchained alistar normally, here's proof of subscribing
thank you in advance

https://gyazo.com/908e5f2c07e71e8aad710704c296c3ec

replies.body: Go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Wk4Ecyon,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-18T23:26:26.520+0000)
>
> Go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do!

What do I have to put into the ticket to get the "Blitzcrank bot" reply?

I did it on my smurf and had to waste a human's time because it didn't trigger the automatic bot.
